alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Santa Clarita Valley; Ventura County Coast; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 8:35PM PST until February 22 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 6 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. Strongest nearest the coast. * WHERE...Los Angeles and Ventura County Coasts, Ventura County Valleys, Santa Clarita Valley and San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 6 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds and reduced visibility from blowing dust will make driving difficult. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
